RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NICKANDME pressed the pace wresting a clear lead on the far turn widening along the rail in upper stretch hanging on at the end. MR. YASUDA gave a quick move on the far turn bidding four wide in upper stretch surging to press the winner late. ANDYLITHIC tracked pace moving to contention on the far turn vying in the three path down the lane being outbid late between horses. MOON OVER DUBAI stalked the pace laying close through the far turn then tired in upper stretch. MY BUDDY MICAH was always outrun. BALLOT BOX was rushed wide to lead early then wilted on the far turn. AMERICAN MOON pressed early wearing out into the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Yasuda
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick move far turn, bid 4 wide, pressed hard last yards

ENTRY.NAME: My Buddy Micah
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Andylithic
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, moved to bid far turn, extended between late

ENTRY.NAME: American Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, spent far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Over Dubai
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Ballot Box
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed wide to the top, wilted far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Nickandme
ENTRY.OWNER: Tackett Paul W and Smith Sr Franklin G
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led far turn, widened at rail lane, held on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 21 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAMANRASSETT stalked the pace rallying clear in the four path upper stretch drawing out late. POLITICAL lost ground throughout coming six wide down the lane getting up for place. LAUTREC stalked the pace through the far turn vying willingly from mid track down the lane. DEJOHN pressed the pace to upper stretch weakening there. MIDNIGHT ALIBI raced evenly fading to upper stretch. LA BRODY leapt in the air at the break. HARD N'SWEET rushed hard to the top worked on a narrow lead through the far turn giving way in upper stretch. FIRING RANGE racing wide was done early.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Alibi
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, faded to lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lautrec
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased mid track lane, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Political
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost ground, 6 wide into lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Hard n'Sweet
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up early, pressed short lead, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Firing Range
ENTRY.COMMENT: racing wide, down early

ENTRY.NAME: Dejohn
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Tamanrassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid clear upper stretch, drew out four path

ENTRY.NAME: La Brody
ENTRY.COMMENT: leapt in air at the break

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 21 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAOLIN rallied to lead on the far turn digging in abreast rival down the lane holding rival at bay. MARKET OF STOCKS set the pace being hooked on the far turn ceding the lead staying on gamely to the end inside of rival; CHORIST slow early saved ground to upper stretch finishing evenly along the inside. I MATTER slow early played no factor. LADY MECHANIC pressed the early pace giving way on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Chorist
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, finished evenly inside

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Mechanic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: I Matter
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Market of Stocks
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked far turn, extended inside foe lane, stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Shaolin
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied to lead far turn, dug in abreast lane, held driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 21 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STEALTHTHIRTYFOUR pressed the pace wresting a short lead on the turn digging in at mid track upper stretch edging clear late. BEYOND TALENTED rushed up outside on the turn bidding six wide in upper stretch angling in late saving place. JOHN'S KID pressed then chased to upper stretch extending in the three path finishing evenly. RAMBLIN CHROME played no factor. OCEAN KISS was always outrun. LOCKDOWN LOVER flashed early speed then gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Ramblin Chrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Lockdown Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond Talented
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed outside on turn, bid 6 wide lane, angled in saved place

ENTRY.NAME: John's Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed then chased to lane, extended three path, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Ocean Kiss
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Stealththirtyfour
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led turn, dug in mid track, edged off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 21, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ORBALINE pressed the pace dueling into upper stretch digging deep inside of rivals to prevail. DEVILISH MAGIC raced evenly through the turn bidding six wide down the lane surging late. EVER SO D'WILD pressed the pace dueling abreast rival down the lane moving between horses late. BELLA BASORA a step slow early lost ground to upper stretch vying late seven wide. ADABEL off slowly lagged to upper stretch gaining ground after the fact eight wide. TREASURED NIKKY flashed early speed then faded on the turn. LA SMOOCHIE led early then gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: La Smoochie
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief lead, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Treasured Nikky
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Devilish Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 6 wide lane, surged late

ENTRY.NAME: Adabel
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, lagged to lane, gained late 8 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Basora
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, lost ground to lane, vied late 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Orbaline
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled inside in lane, dug deep

ENTRY.NAME: Ever So d'Wild
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled abreast, between late, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 21 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $10, 000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUTTON BREEZE set the pace being hooked on the turn shaking off rival to clear in upper stretch drawing out under a drive. POSEIDON'S SON pressed the pace bearing down on the turn being rebuffed in upper stretch extending near mid track to save place. BEACH HOLIDAY slow early lost ground to upper stretch coming on late six wide. C J ALL THE WAY went evenly to upper stretch putting in a mild bid near mid track. GILLIGAN slow early ducked to the inside in upper stretch showing some late interest. LUCKY SMILE chased the pace through the turn weakening in upper stretch. BROTHER SKYE hustled inside chased to upper stretch wearing out late.

ENTRY.NAME: Brother Skye
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled inside, pursued to lane, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: C J All the Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, roused to late, mild bid near mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Sutton Breeze
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and Splurgin Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked on turn, cleared top lane, drew out

ENTRY.NAME: Gilligan
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, ducked inside top lane, some interest

ENTRY.NAME: Poseidon's Son
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled turn, repelled top lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Smile
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Beach Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, gained late 6 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 21 Allowed 3 lbs. (Clai ming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLO BOLO pressed in bid on the turn coming between horses in upper stretch getting up gamely inside of rival latw. FLOWZANO pressed bid three deep on the turn extending abreast rival down the lane being out gamed at the end. GO STELLAIRE slow early raced five wide into upper stretch surging late from mid track. RUN AWAY FEVER off slowly lagged to upper stretch giving a mild rally in the four path. EPICUREAN pressed inside on the turn then steadied when in close past the quarter pole fading after. U SO MONEY BABY inside played no factor. CURT'S ANGEL raced second flight tiring in upper stretch. LADY MARVEL led early ceding on the turn giving way to upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: U So Money Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Go Stellaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 5 wide into lane, surged late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Marvel
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, passed turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Rolo Bolo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed bud turn, between horses lane, up gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Epicurean
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside on the, in close steadied top lane

ENTRY.NAME: Run Away Fever
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, lagged to lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Flowzano
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed three deep turn, dueled abreast lane, out gamed

ENTRY.NAME: Curt's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, tired,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 21, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SELLING OUT slow early lost ground to upper stretch surging up late six wide. DRIVE BY LAYOVER away alertly set the pace widening in upper stretch being grabbed from the outside at the wire. JUSTIN FRONT raced evenly coming five wide to upper stretch moving up late at mid track. PROFESSIONAL chased the pace looming into upper stretch weakening late. KREWE CHIEF raced evenly lacking more. SEXY CHOCOLATTE hustled along chased to lane wearing down late. HOLIDAY BONUS had brief speed then faded on the turn. SOURNOIS was always outrun. STAR DEPUTY folding early was eased to wire. FIELD OF COURAGE took a bad step being euthanized on track.

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday Bonus
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Sournois
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Star Deputy
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded early, eased lane

ENTRY.NAME: Drive by Layover
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, widened top lane, grabbed last strides

ENTRY.NAME: Selling Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, surged up late 6 wide,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Cherie M. Abner & Michael A. Bossio

ENTRY.NAME: Sexy Chocolatte
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pursued to lane, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Krewe Chief
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Justin Front
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 5 wide into lane, moved up mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Professional
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Field of Courage
ENTRY.COMMENT: bad step, euthanized on track
